    • Constructor Detail

      • FileWriter

        public FileWriter​(int reservationNum,
                  java.lang.String reservationName,
                  java.lang.String reservationType,
                  java.lang.String checkIn,
                  java.lang.String checkOut,
                  int numberOfRooms,
                  java.lang.String roomType)
        This constructor makes a FileWriter object that writes data to reservations.csv.
        Parameters:
        reservationNum - int, reservation number.
        reservationName - String, name of reservation.
        reservationType - String, type of reservation S or AP.
        checkIn - String, date of check in.
        checkOut - String, date of check out.
        numberOfRooms - int, the number of rooms ou wish to reserve.
        roomType - String, the name of the room type you wish to book e.g. deluxe standard

      • FileWriter

        public FileWriter​(int resNum,
                  java.lang.String checkInDate,
                  java.lang.String checkOutDate,
                  java.lang.String roomTypeForHotel,
                  double totalCost)
        This constructor makes a FileWriter object that writes data to payment.csv.
        Parameters:
        resNum - int, the reservation number.
        checkInDate - String, date of check in.
        checkOutDate - String, date of check out.
        roomTypeForHotel - String, name of room you will be staying in e.g. deluxe standard.
        totalCost - double, the total cost of your reservation.
